id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the datetime to set.

*See also: [Datetime Component](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-date-set-action)*

date.docs:
**string, date parts, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The value to set the datetime to.

*See also: [Datetime Component](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-date-set-action)*

set.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) for setting a datetime date state. The `date` provided can be in one of 3 formats:

*See also: [`datetime.date.set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-date-set-action)*
